attributes.action: Bring the amount of pension paid to all  ex servicemen to the level that is paid to those leaving in 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pension paid to an ex WO leaving after 25 years service in 1975 is approximately £3000 per annum less than that paid to a person with the same rank and service leaving in 2007

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
